medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrent pleuritic chest pain and pleural effusion.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Left-sided chest pain developed suddenly 3.5 weeks before admission. The pain was worse with inspiration and associated with dyspnea. It rated 4 out of 10 initially but recurred with pain rated at 10 out of 10 17 days after discharge.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertension, hyperlipidemia, diabetes mellitus, hypothyroidism, coronary artery disease, gastroesophageal reflux disease, esophageal spasm, bipolar disorder, and remote history of alcohol abuse.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of cardiac disease and lung cancer; mother died of meningitis.
medical_history.social_history: Lives alone, has a pet dog, receives disability payments, smokes one pack of cigarettes daily (40-year history), stopped drinking alcohol 20 years ago, does not use illicit drugs, and has never traveled out of New England.
